title: Compose A Song
original_prompt: Compose a song with chords similar to the song "Porcelain" by Rachel Taylor
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "song_structure": [
            "verse",
            "chorus",
            "bridge",
            "outro"
        ],
        "musical_elements": [
            "chords",
            "melody",
            "rhythm",
            "harmony"
        ],
        "lyrical_theme": [
            "love",
            "heartbreak",
            "self-discovery",
            "nostalgia"
        ],
        "style_influence": [
            "acoustic",
            "indie",
            "pop",
            "singer-songwriter"
        ]
    }
}
```
input1:
Verse 1: Cmaj7 - G - Am - F  
              In the quiet of the night, shadows dance and play,  
              Memories whisper softly, as the stars fade away.  
              Chorus: F - G - Cmaj7 - Am  
              Like porcelain, fragile dreams, we hold them close,  
              In the light of dawn, we find what matters most.
input2:
Verse 1: Dmaj7 - A - Bm - G  
              Underneath the silver moon, secrets start to bloom,  
              Echoes of our laughter, fill the empty room.  
              Chorus: G - A - Dmaj7 - Bm  
              Like porcelain, our hearts entwined, we’ll never break,  
              In the warmth of love, it’s a chance we’ll take.
input1_ans:
**Verse 1:**  
Cmaj7 - G - Am - F  
In the quiet of the night, shadows dance and play,  
Memories whisper softly, as the stars fade away.  
Cmaj7 - G - Am - F  
Every heartbeat echoes, in the stillness we find,  
A tapestry of moments, woven deep in our minds.  

**Chorus:**  
F - G - Cmaj7 - Am  
Like porcelain, fragile dreams, we hold them close,  
In the light of dawn, we find what matters most.  
F - G - Cmaj7 - Am  
With every breath, we cherish, the beauty in the pain,  
Like porcelain, we’re fragile, but we rise again.  

**Verse 2:**  
Cmaj7 - G - Am - F  
Through the storms and shadows, we learn to stand tall,  
With every scar a story, we embrace it all.  
Cmaj7 - G - Am - F  
In the laughter and the tears, we find our way back,  
A journey of a thousand miles, on this winding track.  

**Chorus:**  
F - G - Cmaj7 - Am  
Like porcelain, fragile dreams, we hold them close,  
In the light of dawn, we find what matters most.  
F - G - Cmaj7 - Am  
With every breath, we cherish, the beauty in the pain,  
Like porcelain, we’re fragile, but we rise again.  

**Bridge:**  
Am - F - Cmaj7 - G  
So let the world keep turning, let the seasons change,  
In the heart of every moment, love will rearrange.  
Am - F - Cmaj7 - G  
With hands that may be trembling, we’ll face the unknown,  
Together we are stronger, never alone.  

**Chorus:**  
F - G - Cmaj7 - Am  
Like porcelain, fragile dreams, we hold them close,  
In the light of dawn, we find what matters most.  
F - G - Cmaj7 - Am  
With every breath, we cherish, the beauty in the pain,  
Like porcelain, we’re fragile, but we rise again.  

**Outro:**  
Cmaj7 - G - Am - F  
In the quiet of the night, shadows dance and play,  
Together we’ll keep dreaming, as the stars fade away.  
Cmaj7 - G - Am - F  
Like porcelain, we’re fragile, but our hearts will remain,  
In the light of love, we’ll never break again.

**Verse 2:**  
Cmaj7 - G - Am - F  
In the echoes of the past, I hear your laughter still,  
A melody of moments, that time cannot distill.  

**Chorus:**  
F - G - Cmaj7 - Am  
Like porcelain, fragile dreams, we hold them close,  
In the light of dawn, we find what matters most.  

**Bridge:**  
Am - F - Cmaj7 - G  
Through the storms and the silence, we learn to let go,  
In the heart of the journey, our true selves will show.  

**Chorus:**  
F - G - Cmaj7 - Am  
Like porcelain, fragile dreams, we hold them close,  
In the light of dawn, we find what matters most.  

**Outro:**  
Cmaj7 - G - Am - F  
So here’s to the moments, both bitter and sweet,  
In the tapestry of life, our hearts will always meet.
input2_ans:
**Verse 1:**  
Dmaj7 - A - Bm - G  
Underneath the silver moon, secrets start to bloom,  
Echoes of our laughter, fill the empty room.  
Dmaj7 - A - Bm - G  
Whispers in the twilight, painting dreams in the air,  
With every gentle heartbeat, I know that you are there.  

**Chorus:**  
G - A - Dmaj7 - Bm  
Like porcelain, our hearts entwined, we’ll never break,  
In the warmth of love, it’s a chance we’ll take.  
G - A - Dmaj7 - Bm  
Fragile yet unyielding, we’ll stand the test of time,  
In this dance of shadows, your hand will always find mine.  

**Verse 2:**  
Dmaj7 - A - Bm - G  
Through the storms and thunder, we’ll weather every fight,  
With every tear that falls, we’ll find our way to light.  
Dmaj7 - A - Bm - G  
In the tapestry of moments, woven with our dreams,  
Together we are stronger, more than what it seems.  

**Chorus:**  
G - A - Dmaj7 - Bm  
Like porcelain, our hearts entwined, we’ll never break,  
In the warmth of love, it’s a chance we’ll take.  
G - A - Dmaj7 - Bm  
Fragile yet unyielding, we’ll stand the test of time,  
In this dance of shadows, your hand will always find mine.  

**Bridge:**  
Bm - A - G - Dmaj7  
And when the world feels heavy, I’ll carry you through,  
With every step we take, I’ll always choose you.  
Bm - A - G - Dmaj7  
In the silence of the night, our dreams will softly soar,  
With you beside me, I could never ask for more.  

**Chorus:**  
G - A - Dmaj7 - Bm  
Like porcelain, our hearts entwined, we’ll never break,  
In the warmth of love, it’s a chance we’ll take.  
G - A - Dmaj7 - Bm  
Fragile yet unyielding, we’ll stand the test of time,  
In this dance of shadows, your hand will always find mine.  

**Outro:**  
Dmaj7 - A - Bm - G  
Underneath the silver moon, our love will always shine,  
In this beautiful moment, forever you are mine.  
Dmaj7 - A - Bm - G  
Like porcelain, we’ll shine, through the dark and the light,  
Together we’ll keep dancing, through the endless night.
